Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Synermed Opiate Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of opiates in urine using enzyme immunoassay methodology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of opiates in human urine at 300 ng/mL cutoff, calibrated against morphine, for use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; intended for prescription professional use only and provides a preliminary result requiring confirmation with a more specific analytical method such as GC/MS or LC/MS.
